bibl.title: Nine Orders to Pay from Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.note: Instructions about the monthly payroll of an estate, the chief product of which appears to be wine. The documents must be dated to A.D. 260 or after, but not much later than the end of the third century [= P. Oxy. XLIX, 3513-3521].
bibl.seg: Stephens Susan A., Nine Orders to Pay from Oxyrhynchus.

Instructions about the monthly payroll of an estate, the chief product of which appears to be wine. The documents must be dated to A.D. 260 or after, but not much later than the end of the third century [= P. Oxy. XLIX, 3513-3521].
